project.description: Merge a pull request after tests have passed in serial for a given branch

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DEV_TOOLS_EXT_PULL_ID
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The pull id to use for the dev tools ext repo.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: ORIGIN_SERVER_PULL_ID
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The pull id to use for the origin-server repo.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: RHC_PULL_ID
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The pull id to use for the rhc repo.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DEV_TOOLS_PULL_ID
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The pull id to use for the dev tools repo.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
rm -rf $DEV_TOOLS_REPO $DEV_TOOLS_EXT_REPO
git clone git@github.com:openshift/${DEV_TOOLS_REPO}.git pushd $DEV_TOOLS_REPO git checkout $BRANCH popd git clone git@github.com:openshift/${DEV_TOOLS_EXT_REPO}.git pushd $DEV_TOOLS_EXT_REPO git checkout $BRANCH build/devenv clone_addtl_repos $BRANCH --replace popd if [ -n "$DEV_TOOLS_EXT_PULL_ID" ] then set +x echo "
*****Locally Merging Pull Request: https://github.com/openshift/${DEV_TOOLS_EXT_REPO}/pull/$DEV_TOOLS_EXT_PULL_ID" set -x test_pull_requests --local_merge_pull_request $DEV_TOOLS_EXT_PULL_ID --repo $DEV_TOOLS_EXT_REPO fi
if [ -n "$ORIGIN_SERVER_PULL_ID" ] then set +x echo "
*****Locally Merging Pull Request: https://github.com/openshift/${ORIGIN_SERVER_REPO}/pull/$ORIGIN_SERVER_PULL_ID" set -x test_pull_requests --local_merge_pull_request $ORIGIN_SERVER_PULL_ID --repo $ORIGIN_SERVER_REPO fi
if [ -n "$RHC_PULL_ID" ] then set +x echo "
*****Locally Merging Pull Request: https://github.com/openshift/${RHC_REPO}/pull/$RHC_PULL_ID" set -x test_pull_requests --local_merge_pull_request $RHC_PULL_ID --repo $RHC_REPO fi
if [ -n "$DEV_TOOLS_PULL_ID" ] then set +x echo "
*****Locally Merging Pull Request: https://github.com/openshift/${DEV_TOOLS_REPO}/pull/$DEV_TOOLS_PULL_ID" set -x test_pull_requests --local_merge_pull_request $DEV_TOOLS_PULL_ID --repo $DEV_TOOLS_REPO fi
set +x echo "
" set -x
pushd $DEV_TOOLS_EXT_REPO build/devenv build merge_pull_requests_generic ${BUILD_NUMBER} --terminate --install_from_local_source --yum_repo=$YUM_REPO --branch=$BRANCH popd
# Make sure all the pull requests will merge cleanly if [ -n "$DEV_TOOLS_EXT_PULL_ID" ] then test_pull_requests --test_merge_pull_request $DEV_TOOLS_EXT_PULL_ID --repo $DEV_TOOLS_EXT_REPO fi
if [ -n "$ORIGIN_SERVER_PULL_ID" ] then test_pull_requests --test_merge_pull_request $ORIGIN_SERVER_PULL_ID --repo $ORIGIN_SERVER_REPO fi
if [ -n "$RHC_PULL_ID" ] then test_pull_requests --test_merge_pull_request $RHC_PULL_ID --repo $RHC_REPO fi
if [ -n "$DEV_TOOLS_PULL_ID" ] then test_pull_requests --test_merge_pull_request $DEV_TOOLS_PULL_ID --repo $DEV_TOOLS_REPO fi
# Do the merge if [ -n "$DEV_TOOLS_EXT_PULL_ID" ] then test_pull_requests --merge_pull_request $DEV_TOOLS_EXT_PULL_ID --repo $DEV_TOOLS_EXT_REPO fi
if [ -n "$ORIGIN_SERVER_PULL_ID" ] then test_pull_requests --merge_pull_request $ORIGIN_SERVER_PULL_ID --repo $ORIGIN_SERVER_REPO fi
if [ -n "$RHC_PULL_ID" ] then test_pull_requests --merge_pull_request $RHC_PULL_ID --repo $RHC_REPO fi
if [ -n "$DEV_TOOLS_PULL_ID" ] then test_pull_requests --merge_pull_request $DEV_TOOLS_PULL_ID --repo $DEV_TOOLS_REPO fi
